abstract: The bank sold 4.9 billion shares to bolster its financial strength in one of the largest such offerings in British history.
snippet: The bank sold 4.9 billion shares to bolster its financial strength in one of the largest such offerings in British history.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  HSBC Holdings said Sunday that it had raised nearly $18 billion by issuing new shares to investors, one of the largest such offerings in British history.

headline.main: HSBC Raises $17.7 Billion in Stock Sale
headline.print_headline: HSBC Raises $17.7 Billion In Stock Sale
